prompt:
Generate the “## Demo” section.  
- Heading: ## Demo  
- Embed the GIF at assets/demo.gif.  
- Write 2–3 sentences describing what the user sees (e.g., the CLI improving a README, showing badges, TOC, etc.).  
- Format as:

```markdown
## Demo

![Demo](assets/demo.gif)

_Your descriptive caption here._
```
response:
```markdown
## Demo

![Demo](assets/demo.gif)

In this demo, you can see the CLI tool in action as it automatically generates a table of contents (TOC) for a README file. The tool also adds badges for build status and code coverage, enhancing the overall readability and professionalism of the document.
```
